problem.title: The Problem
problem.heading: Why you're losing conversions
problem.description: Every time you share a traditional link on LinkedIn that should open in a mobile app or the native browser, you're losing potential customers and engagement.

more.description1: No one wants to be trapped in a mini-browser integrated into an app (like LinkedIn or Instagram). Your visitors don't either.
more.description2: Users are frustrated for many reasons, including social accounts disconnection, payment processors not working, etc. Most people abandon before subscribing or buying.
more.description3: Traditional links create friction in the user journey, damaging your brand reputation and reducing engagement rates.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.heading: Share pim.ms deep links today
solution.description: <logo>PIMMS</logo> detects which app should open your link and sends users directly there, creating a seamless experience that increases conversion rates.

more.description1: Deep link automatically detect the user's device and opens the link in the most appropriate mobile application.
more.description2: Visitors stay engaged since they use those apps daily and are already logged in. As a result, you get much more conversions
more.description3: Track user journeys and click rates to optimize your marketing campaigns.

free_offer.description: Stop losing conversions - start with 3 free deep links today.
